TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewImageCell extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell

summary.span: 显示 控件中的图形。

span.span: Displays a graphic in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是用于显示 或 的一种专用类型 ，具体取决于 属性的值。The class is a specialized type of used to display an or an , depending on the value of the property. 通常， 的 属性设置为 `true`，以指示用户无法编辑单元格内容。Typically, the property of a is set to `true` to indicate that the user cannot edit the cell contents. 是专用于保存此类型的单元格的列类型。The is the column type specialized to hold cells of this type. 默认情况下， 初始化为新的 。By default, the is initialized to a new . 若要在现有 之后对列中的单元格进行样式设置，请将列的 属性设置为要用作模式的单元格。To pattern the cells within a column after an existing , set the column's property to the cell to use as a pattern. 此列的单元格相关属性是模板单元的名称相同的属性的包装。The cell-related properties of the column are wrappers for the similarly-named properties of the template cell. 更改模板单元的属性值将仅影响基于更改后添加的模板的单元格。Changing the property values of the template cell will affect only cells based on the template that are added after the change. 但是，更改列的单元格相关属性值将更新列中的模板单元和所有其他单元，并在必要时刷新列显示。Changing the cell-related property values of the column, however, will update the template cell and all other cells in the column, and refresh the column display if necessary. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 更改图像单元中的图像。The following code example demonstrates how to change the image in an image cell using . 此代码示例是为主题[如何：在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中处理图像列](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control)而提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the topic [How to: Work with Image Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数时， 属性设置为 `valueIsIcon` 参数的值。When you use this constructor, the property is set to the value of the `valueIsIcon` parameter. 若要确保正确绘制 值的 alpha 通道，请将此构造函数与 `valueIsIcon` 参数值 `true`。To ensure that the alpha channel of values is painted correctly, use this constructor with a `valueIsIcon` parameter value of `true`. 如果 `valueIsIcon` 参数 `true`，则 和 属性返回表示 类型的 对象。If the `valueIsIcon` parameter is `true`, the and properties return a object representing the type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值应为 或类型 类型，具体取决于 属性的值。The value of this property should be of type or type , depending on the value of the property. 每当显示可添加新行的 时，最后一行都是使用默认值加载的空白新行单元。Whenever a is displayed in which new rows can be added, the last row is an empty new row of cells loaded with default values. 重写此属性可为这些单元格提供不同的默认图像，或返回 `null` 以避免显示图像。Override this property to provide a different default image for these cells or to return `null` to avoid displaying images.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常会为每个图像单元提供文本说明。You will typically provide a text description for each image cell. 此描述提供了可访问的映像替代方法。This description provides an accessible alternative to the image. 此外，在将单元值复制到剪贴板时，还会使用描述文本。Additionally, the description text is used when the cell value is copied onto the Clipboard. 设置所属列的 属性还会设置列中每个单元格的 属性。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column. 若要覆盖单个单元的指定值，请在设置列值后设置单元值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性，该属性类似于此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 此示例摘自[如何：在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中处理图像列](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control)中提供的一个更大的示例。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Work with Image Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control). returns.span: 表示格式化图像的对象。

span.span: An object that represents the formatted image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件调用此方法将单元格值转换为 属性指示的类型的等效显示值。The control calls this method to convert a cell value into an equivalent display value of the type indicated by the property. 控件将单元格值传递到 `value` 参数中的此方法。The control passes the cell value to this method in the `value` parameter. 如果 `context` 参数值包括 值，则此方法将返回 属性的值，以便将其复制到剪贴板。If the `context` parameter value includes the value, this method returns the value of the property for copying to the Clipboard. 否则， 事件发生。Otherwise, the event occurs. 事件处理程序可以修改 `value` 和 `cellStyle`。A event handler can modify both `value` and `cellStyle`. 但是，如果处理程序未将 属性设置为 `true`，则此方法使用 `cellStyle` 对象的格式设置属性来设置 `value` 格式。If the handler does not set the property to `true`, however, this method formats `value` using the formatting properties of the `cellStyle` object. 如果格式设置不成功，则会发生 事件。If formatting is unsuccessful, the event occurs. 如果此事件没有处理程序，或者处理程序将 属性设置为 `true`，则会引发异常。If there is no handler for this event or the handler sets the property to `true`, an exception is thrown. 如果格式化成功并且格式设置值的类型与 属性的值匹配，则此方法返回格式化的值。If formatting is successful and the type of the formatted value matches the value of the property, this method returns the formatted value. 否则，此方法将返回 属性指示的类型中的标准错误图形。Otherwise, this method returns a standard error graphic in the type indicated by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更改此属性将导致单元格重绘其自身。Changing this property will cause the cell to redraw itself. 设置所属列的 属性还会设置列中每个单元格的 属性并刷新列显示。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆盖单个单元的指定值，请在设置列值后设置单元值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.

span.span: The supplied value is invalid.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，它指示该单元格是否显示 值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this cell displays an value.

value.span: 如果该单元格显示 值，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this cell displays an value; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要确保正确绘制 值的 alpha 通道，请将此属性设置为 `true`。To ensure that the alpha channel of values is painted correctly, set this property to `true`. `true`此属性时， 和 属性返回表示 类型的 对象。When this property is `true`, the and properties return a object representing the type. 设置所属列的 属性还会设置列中每个单元格的 属性并刷新列显示。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆盖单个单元的指定值，请在设置列值后设置单元值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. 当新记录行中的单元格的此属性的值发生更改时，会将单元格中显示的图像更新为 属性的当前值。When the value of this property changes for a cell in the row for new records, the image displayed in the cell is updated to the current value of the property. 与 column 属性不同，当您更改关联的单元格样式的值时，该单元 属性不会自动更新其 属性。Unlike the column property, the cell property does not automatically update the property of the associated cell style when you change its value. 将单元 属性值更改为 `true`时，请确保将 属性返回的对象的 属性设置为有效的 。When you change the cell property value to `true`, be sure to set the property of the object returned by the property to a valid . 将 属性值更改为 `false`时，请确保将 属性设置为有效 。When you change the property value to `false`, be sure to set the property to a valid .

summary.span: 获取或设置单元格中值的数据类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the data type of the values in the cell.
The of the cell's value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 检索此属性时，如果尚未设置单元格的 ，则使用所属列的 （如果存在）。When retrieving this property, if the for the cell has not been set, then the for the owning column is used, if it exists. 如果不存在所属列，则使用默认值类型，如果将 属性设置为 `false`，则使用默认值类型，否则 为 类型。If no owning column exists, the default value type is used, which is the type if the property is set to `false` and the type otherwise. 是单元中包含的实际数据对象，而 属性是此对象的格式化表示形式。The is the actual data object contained in the cell, whereas the property is the formatted representation of this object. 和 属性分别对应于这些值的数据类型。The and properties correspond to the data types of these values, respectively.
